post_detail.title: CFM Creates The Ultimate Tailgate Experience For Sharp
post_detail.description: To commemorate the start of football season, CFM developed a Facebook app that encouraged Sharp's fans to create their ultimate tailgate experience. The app was integrated into a month-long Facebook contest. After customizing their tailgate with team colors, decorations, personalized pictures, and a half-time video, users submitted their party and were eligible to win real-world prizes. Fans could win one of three big screen AQUOS LED TVs as well as all the goodies necessary to truly bring the ultimate tailgate experience to life this football season.
